description: Students who have taken five political science courses, one of which is in the area of the proposed research, may propose an independent research project to a member of the departmental faculty. Prerequisite: PSCI 220 and one course in the subfield or permission of instructor.
name: IR/Violence and Religion
prerequisites: Prerequisite: PSCI 220 and one course in the subfield or permission of instructor.
title: Independent Research
